attributes.action: To remove/ stop gender neutral toilets/ changing rooms.
attributes.additional_details: I want them to stop gender neutral toilets and changing rooms going up or  already installed in schools, gyms, collages, Universities, everywhere. Its important for girls/ woman to feel safe and secure in these areas but in this current climate we are fearing for our safety and its an encroachment on our right for privacy.
attributes.background: I want gender neutral changing rooms/ toilets to be abolished due to a lack of safety for females.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what toilet facilities to make available are a matter for individual businesses and local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to require all publicly accessible toilets have separate toilets for men and women, but this could mean that many businesses that only have a single toilet (including a disabled toilet) would no longer be able to have this open to the public.
